li.label: Cautious of overstepping boundaries
li.description: Yearning for enlightenment, yet cautious not to overstep their bounds.

li.label: Fearing the wrath
li.description: Fearing the wrath of the divine for seeking knowledge not meant for mortals.

li.label: The Hour of Judgment
li.description: Pleading for forgiveness for tasting the Forbidden Fruit.

li.label: slight noise
li.description: I feel like I'm hearing a melody, but I can't be certain.

li.label: extreme noise
li.description: My heart pounds and I'm sweating. The singing never stops. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...

li.label: high noise
li.description: The voice is unbearably loud. It's hard to concentrate. I find myself talking back to it, yelling at it. But it just keeps singing!

li.label: moderate noise
li.description: I feel like someone is always just out of sight, singing to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!

li.label: low noise
li.description: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, sings quietly. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.

li.label: Fleshmass lung stimulation
li.description: Feeling light headed. What a nice feeling.

li.label: got candy cane
li.description: A surge of sweet anticipation washed over them, a smile spreading across their face as they unwrapped the bright red and white candy cane.

li.label: got lump of coal
li.description: Disappointment washed over them as they pulled out the lump of coal, a sense of shame momentarily clouding their mood.

li.label: I'm the speed
li.description: Everything slowed down. But I'm actually faster than anyone around me.

li.label: Dragging words
li.description: Everyone's words are just... dragging. It's so hard to actually talk with them.

li.label: Pastimes now tedious
li.description: Those things I loved doing to relax? Now they just drag on and on... It's hard to enjoy them like this.

li.label: Fast, but yet slow
li.description: I can do everything really fast. The downside? Realizing just how slow everything else is, and knowing I have to adjust and wait for it.

li.label: Frustrating conversations
li.description: Everything just drags on so slowly. It's almost physically painful. And when I try to talk to people, they don't understand a word, and I can't wait to decipher what they're trying to tell me either.

li.label: The lonely frozen world
li.description: It feels like time itself has stopped for everyone but me. And then this wave of loneliness just washes over me.
